name: Minotaur Living Crystal Statue
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.Immutable Form: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

actions.Multiattack: The statue makes two attacks: one with its greataxe and one gore attack.
actions.Greataxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Gore: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
